features: The Perfect Learning Toy – enhance your child’s Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills with the KAKATIMES STEM building block toys. This pack comes with multiple blocks that can connect in unlimited ways to engage your kid’s creativity.

High Quality 88PCS Blocks – forget those delicate blocks that get damaged after a week or so. KAKATIMES building blocks are created from a high quality material that is not only safe but also sturdy and easy to pick and build. Get more value for money with our premium toys pack.

The Ultimate Flexibility – when it comes to building block toys for kids, flexibility is the name of the game. You get all the round and connecting blocks your kid needs to make windmills, towers, animals, and whatever strikes their imagination.

Toys for Coordination – are you looking for a ‘learn through pay’ toy that can help child improve hand-eye coordination? Our building blocks are designed by educational experts to boost problem solving skills, improve fine motor skills, enhance logical thinking.

Premium Brand Guarantee – you get a pack of high quality, multi-colored building blocks that can be used to construct a variety of shapes. If you are not happy with this product, let us know and we will process a replacement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gift Toy for STEM Education Gift Toy for STEM Education KAKATIMES educational building block toy supports Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math understanding in young children. This valuable ‘learn through play’ toy will improve your child’s imagination and creativity by encouraging them to build robots, cars, animals, and anything else they can imagine. What’s more, if you need a toy for a kid’s birthday party or holiday present – this is the perfect choice.

The Perfect Learning Toy Enhance your child’s Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills with the KAKATIMES STEM building block toys. This pack comes with multiple blocks that can connect in unlimited ways to engage your kid’s creativity. High Quality Blocks Forget those delicate blocks that get damaged after a week or so. KAKATIMES building blocks are created from a high quality material that is not only safe but also sturdy and easy to pick and build. Get more value for money with our premium toys pack. The Ultimate Flexibility When it comes to building block toys for kids, flexibility is the name of the game. You get all the round and connecting blocks your kid needs to make windmills, towers, animals, and whatever strikes their imagination. Toys for Coordination Are you looking for a ‘learn through pay’ toy that can help child improve hand-eye coordination? Our building blocks are designed by educational experts to boost problem solving skills, improve fine motor skills, enhance logical thinking.

Build Your Child’s Intelligence The first 6 years are crucial when it comes to developing your kid’s cognitive abilities. The KAKATIMES range of building blocks and other children’s toys are designed to help build capacity and intelligence in kids below the age of 8. Each piece is designed from high qualitity materials that can withstand rough handling, and come in varying colors to engage your kids’s imagination in unlimited ways. Invest in a simple, easy to use toy that can do wonders for your kid’s problem solving ability and fine motor skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun toy for toddlers to kindergarten
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 4.5 yo son who is in the beginning of learning to build things. He’s really used it a lot so far from building random shapes or just putting the pieces on his fingers. The pieces aren’t flimsy and definitely won’t wear out. I’d buy it again or more sets like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased as a birthday present for my friends son who loves these building blocks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great add to the STEM pile
reviews.reviewText: My girls love to create new things with these tubes. I bought two packs a few months apart and the colors changed, but otherwise everything worked. These are durable but have snapped when pulling them apart when they're really stuck on there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice game for a few different ages
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice toy. Kids are able to build creative pieces with it. I noticed with time the wheels and connectors of them some broke, but in general the actual pipes are great quality and we purchased two sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nephew loves it
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 3 year old nephew and he has played with a great deal. Good quality. His parents really enjoy interacting with him and have fun themselves with it. Sometimes dad plays with it after he goes ti bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Great value and hours of fun for my boys

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great idea, poor execution
reviews.reviewText: While my 3 year old loves these, they have a fatal design flaw in that they only include straight pieces with both a male and female end. They need to include straight pieces with both female and both male. It is very difficult to construct something while having to think in an unintuitive way just to make what should be a fairly simple design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For indoor recess
reviews.reviewText: My students love these blocks. They are very creative
